oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: DeFord Bailey Performance - Tape 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 3 of 3. Recording from tape features DeFord Bailey (performer) performing on December 15, 1973.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: DeFord Bailey
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) David Morton tells DeFord Bailey that they are about to play "Shake That Thing" -- (00:05) Shake That Thing (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (02:13) Morton complements Bailey, and Bailey demonstrates how to perform the French harp without teeth -- (03:45) Ice Water Blues (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (04:53) Bailey and Morton continue to discuss the Banjo and French Harp -- (05:56) The Train (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (08:06) Bailey explains how Morton how to create different sounds on the French Harp -- (08:48) Train (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (10:06) Train (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (11:26) Bailey gives his Christmas Greeting for Morton's home town
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bailey, DeFord; Bailey, DeFord, 1899-1982;
